testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a link to Class Homepage that requires licensing and passes a redemption code to it as a student

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a link to Class Homepage that requires licensing and passes a redemption code to it as a student

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a link to Class Homepage that requires licensing and passes a redemption code to it as a student

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a link to Class Homepage that requires licensing and passes a redemption code to it as a student
